name: CannonBall Z
description:
CannonBall Z is a multiplayer game for up to 4 players. The objective of the game is to capture the treasure chest from the ship in the middle of the island and claim it as your own!

Pick up weapons to blast your opponents away! Launch yourself into the air! Pick up more to upgrade your shots for even more blasting power! Battle the other players to reach the ship in the middle, grab the treasure chest for yourself and make a run for it!

The treasure chest is HUGE and will be obnoxiously displayed above your head, showing your opponents will know exactly where to rain down their fury as they strive to plunder your loot! The player carrying the chest will lose the chest if hit by any explosions, even their own!

To score a point you must successfully bring the treasure chest back to your boat, once delivered your loot is safe and cannot be stolen. The player who brings the most treasure to their boat is crowned the winner!

Overall, "CannonBall Z" is an exciting and fun game that tests players' strategic thinking, agility, and combat skills.

ASSET PACKS USED:

- Based on first-person template from Unreal Engine, Epic Games

- Animation Starter Pack, Epic Games

- Infinity Blade: Effects, Epic Games

- Miguel Johnson - Pirates out for Blood

- Pirate Music Pack, alkakrab

- Pirate Hat, nyu_grad_alley_2020
